Sequence Information.Peptide Name: RetroFK-13 (retro-FK13, LLAA, synthetic AMPs, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: sequence reversal, sequence shuffling, designed, man-made sequences

Literature Information.Literature: Peptide design: LLAA was obtained by reversing the core antimicrobial peptide (residues 17-29) of LL-37.Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (42.86%) toaurein 1.2.  R: 23%; I=F=K: 15%. GRAVY: -0.44; M Wt: 1719.106; M formula: C80H135N25O17, mol ex coeff: 0.Activity: active against E. coli (MIC 20 uM).Structure: a helical structure for residues 4-12 was found in complex with SDS micelles. Hence, the helical structure is retained after sequence reversal.Updated 7/2024
Literature Information.Author: Li X, Li Y, Peterkofsky A, Wang G. 2006
Literature Information.Title: NMR studies of aurein 1.2 analogs
